entry.title: Sunday night: Showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Showers beginning early this evening and ending after midnight then 30 percent chance of showers overnight. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 early this evening. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers in the morning and early in the afternoon. A few rain showers and wet flurries beginning in the afternoon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High 9. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: A few rain showers and wet flurries changing to a few flurries in the evening. Local snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Sunday 16 April 2023
